alert.note: Alert for McCormick (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 6:43PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lincoln and west central McCormick Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 642 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tignall, or 9 miles northeast of Washington, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lincolnton, Elijah Clark State Park, Hickory Knob State Resort Park, Loce, Gill`s Point, Bordeaux, Hester`s Ferry Campground, Baker Creek State Park, Leroy`s Ferry Recreation Area, Woodlawn, Curry Hill, Chennault, New Hope, Long Cane Creek Picnic Area and Willington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
